data:item.name: MCXN Portable Anomaly Detect Demo
data:item.display_title: Portable Anomaly Detect Demo with FRDM-MCXN947 and FXLS8974CF (ML Vibro Sens Click)
data:item.overview:
The Portable Anomaly Detect demo shows an on-device trainable anomaly detection platform that is based on the FRDM-MCXN947 board. The demo shows how to train the SVM model on-device with FXLS8974CF accelerometer data and inference SVM model on-device too.
During the whole life cycle of a device, learning may need to be done multiple times.
The GUI is implemented in LVGL.
